Member Function Documentation

bool Analysis::CalibrationDataInterfaceROOT::HadronisationReferenceHelper::getReference ( const std::string &  spec,
std::string &  ref 
) const

Retrieve the (full) name of the reference histogram, given the hadronisation specification. The return value will be false if the specification cannot be found, and true otherwise.
